original_title: World Bank VP meets President; Talks focus on debt, reforms
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Martin Raiser, the World Bank’s Vice President for the South Asia Region met with Sri Lankan President Ranil Wickremesinghe for talks on Monday (17).
He tweeted that they discussed the progress on debt, and reforms that are vital to boost private investments for the country's economic recovery.
He noted that the months ahead are critical for Sri Lanka, and that the World Bank stands ready to support the island nation.
